Modular-Hierarchical API¶

This module provides convenient wrapper functions for the C++-functions sampling from the modular-hierarchical small-world network model.

sixdegrees.modular_hierarchical_api.modular_hierarchical_network(B, L, k, mu, use_largest_component=False, delete_non_largest_component_nodes=True, seed=0)[source]¶
